main event: A reddish white object was observed moving in a straight line at approximately 100 feet altitude for 30 minutes.
interesting points: The object was about 3 feet wide and covered an area of approximately 12 miles during the sighting., The object had no sound, tail, trail, or exhaust., The sighting occurred during a night with heavy overcast weather., Two flights of F-100 aircraft were reported in the area during the sighting., No physical evidence of the sighting was available or known at the present time.
witness description: observer identified as MR, location corresponds with the report.
